sentences.sContent: Where children respect a parent and know that he or she demands good behavior in school, even mediocre or loutish teachers can pull off the trick④of producing modestly literate and numerate children.
sentences.sContent_eng: Where children respect a parent and know that he or she demands good behavior in school, even mediocre or loutish teachers can pull off the trick④of producing modestly literate and numerate children.
sentences.sCn: 如果孩子尊重父母，并且知道父母要求自己好好上学，即便是平庸的或是很笨的老师也能够成功地教出一般水平的能读会算的小学生。

words.tran: 计算；数字的读法；[数] 命数法；编号
